email_chain.subject: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. Following our discussion, please find our firm offer for the shipment of steel coils:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Shanghai
Discharge Port: Long Beach
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV OCEAN HARMONY
Freight: USD 75/MT
Laycan: 10-15 Oct 2023

Offer is firm for 48 hours. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Cargo Transport Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 75/MT seems a bit high given the current market. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 70/MT? Also, could you provide details on the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Michael Nguyen
Steelworks Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Thank you for your feedback. I can adjust the rate to USD 72/MT. The MV OCEAN HARMONY has a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 250 meters. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Laura,

USD 72/MT is more acceptable. However, we are flexible with the laycan and could extend it to 10-20 Oct. Could you adjust the rate to USD 70/MT with this extended laycan?

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Extending the laycan to 10-20 Oct allows us more flexibility. I can agree to USD 70/MT with this revised laycan. Please confirm your acceptance.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Laura,

USD 70/MT works for us. Please proceed with the booking and send over the recap.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Great! Recap attached. Thank you for your business.

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Shanghai
Discharge Port: Long Beach
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV OCEAN HARMONY
Freight: USD 70/MT
Laycan: 10-20 Oct 2023
Demurrage: USD 10,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Cargo Transport Brokers
